entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -34.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 06:36 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -34.3°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
